issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fixVersions.description: The release will stabilize core components, improve performances and adds new streaming algorithms. Unmaintained code is getting killed as part of this

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
mahout/bin/mahout vectordump --help output looks well till --seqFile, then it goes like below
